name: Micron Technology
description: Micron Technology, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells memory and storage products in the United States, Taiwan, Mainland China, rest of the Asia Pacific, Hong Kong, Japan, Europe, and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Compute and Networking Business Unit, Mobile Business Unit, Embedded Business Unit, and Storage Business Unit. It provides memory and storage technologies comprising dynamic random access memory semiconductor devices with low latency that provide high-speed data retrieval; non-volatile and re-writeable semiconductor storage devices; and non-volatile re-writable semiconductor memory devices that provide fast read speeds under the Micron and Crucial brands, as well as through private label
